The fundamental type of the schema.
A
type is a type that supports arbitrary
additions as long as those additions are keyed by strings starting
with “x-” (e.g. “x-customThing”).
A required, non-nullable object schema.
types allow their descriptions to be overridden to facilitate

can specify a description to be used instead of
